last_comment: Not sure why we debate about this stock. Fan followers will believe what they want and vice versa is true as well. While the numbers might not justify the stock value.. who cares when folks are willing to pay for it.

PF2JIYVXCQRJI5D6UUN5E3FTDL.body: Newsome lockdown coming again?  Lets see how this plays out.

2BWKU6FDHUOLINGV23CGJUUYII.body: 72000 cars in 3 months... That's about how many Toyota sells every 3 days

564CV3BONQZPMLO5BA6Z5ILQ3U.body: How convenient another pharmaceutical company announcement about COVID drug at 920 am this morning to pump market more in an epidemic first was moderna then another one can’t even remember but they all make breakthrough announcements right before the open complete scam

YV3DQKIRR6KLX5LWTWPZHJMMTY.body: Tesla is headed for a disaster. It's lineup of electric cars is about to become ordinary, common place. The competition is bringing out the same product, and probably for less cost. But it's the future that drives Tesla stock, especially the fully autonomous dream, of Tesla owners letting their cars roam free, picking up strays who are not so fortunate as to own a Musk-mobile. But that is a false dream. Instead, Alphabet, Amazon, and Apple - which are developing real autonomous vehicles that will be able to navigate city streets at 35 mph and not just parking lot maneuvers at 2 mph - will populate the cities with their autonomous corporate owned fleets, putting a dagger into the heart of Tesla hype. Indeed, Musk made a fool's errand by declaring his approach with cameras and radar as sufficient when it is only good for second-rate driver's assist and parking lot maneuvers. So he is so far behind of the curve in the development of the necessary LIDAR technology that he cannot catch up - indeed, he doesn't even realize the need - well, at this point he probably does but he knows it's too late in the game to change his approach so he might as well hype his infallibility to milk his dead-end approach as much as possible before he is discovered by the fawning masses. This is why Tesla stock will essentially disappear once these tech behemoths, with tens of thousands of world-class scientists and engineers working on the problem, flood the streets with their truly autonomous ride service fleets.

5IOCRJ6ZHANF22E3NUBSX4HRP4.body: Look like it set up for 1200 tomorrow based on the call options

U7T2QACHXBN4V56YPJICDEYYHA.body: Thinking it could hit 1250 tomorrow?  Any thoughts for a good selling point?

LS5ZYO3H4OEEYLRWX6RD5ASZN4.body: #$%$  We might be waiting for a while for the market to totally crash.

25VP5ATMF3DTTCBLU2SXZTKHOI.body:
Around 11:00 a.m. California time on Wednesday, Tesla CEO Elon Musk sent out an e-mail congratulating his tens of thousands of employees.
"Just amazing how well you executed, especially in such difficult times. I am so proud to work with you!" read the email in its entirety.

GPNC2W2WT35IBRJ463AZOSQUZU.body: Less than 1000 car sales a day and you cheerleaders are dancing and celebrating being in S&P500 and highest valued car stock in the world.  Meanwhile, CA is shutting back down and USA new COVID cases were almost 53000.

HJIGGL62YTTB7A35WCGIRN2LZE.body: Is there any particular reason why Falsi "Big Ears" MD [ The Man behind Mask] sometimes wore the Mask while testifying in Congress and sometimes not ? Was it some kind of manifestation of Science Behind Mask that regular folk does not understand............

IW3P3H6ZHSFMTBEN33AXEZFC4M.body:
Pure stock manipulation. Where is the SEC? Also, why is Musk providing advance info to his employees?
"Tesla is expected to report its second quarter vehicle delivery and production numbers after the bell on Thursday, and Musk’s Wednesday email suggests that Tesla hit its goals."
https://www.cnbc.com/2020/07/01/elon-musk-congratulates-tesla-employees-ahead-of-q2-deliveries-report.html

KXIS55WJ5GZGXYDNJJ46ME6GYA.body: This is so over valued I just can’t wait.

NGZG7YHYI4MFWRVEINEVGY3LEA.body: What the heck were people doing after hours, pushing stock up another 18 points. Were they sleeping during normal hours? I've bought and sold so many times these days and it's still going up, amazing. Seriously I think it'll peak tomorrow. It releases delivery number tomorrow after market, and there should be a sell on news next Monday.

3YJFQJRKDG7WEZIXULMX2MHSCI.body: I sold 17 shares of Tesla and bought 1000 shares of WKHS early today.

7QOXRX4UNA7SQUJUS5VALOYBNI.body: If BA got good certification news tomorrow the market will blast off and Tesla will +$100 minimum

B42P2P7WMNMUNKPNZOHUFFXJIY.body: Leaked email last week paved the way to the latest leak apparently. I don't understand why they just don't make all there internal emails available to the public. https://www.thestreet.com/tesla/news/elon-musk-leaked-q2-email

5IE77PZL5QDBHBW7DZ3PF2NETK.body: I haven’t bought another phone besides an iPhone since they first came out.  I will never, ever, ever buy a Tesla anything.

QSFI2K7NSNCUI2FV2DL3TLCEXI.body: Are you guys still in TSLA? They just got featured on the watchlist at (http://tradenow.xyz)

UWTCKBHW2U5HZBDTUBU6F7J2NG.body:
If I had to choose between raising taxes or create inflation, I will vote with raising taxes.
What about you?

O3SZYBCVMQRMELGILHXLOA3GPY.body: How about the BLM get some money from those Nasty NETFLIX stock holders!!!    They should PAY!!!!!!

BFIYYLJT2KFMASL344UWFPOYFQ.body: Realistically tesla is worth more than XOM and Toyota combined.

OBL3TVGKN27DN55RGGLIQM426Y.body: Shorting this irrational exuberance, the froth will come down very soon...

ZFCBJS7A2IAMP42IZH74W5REZM.body: Not sure why we debate about this stock. Fan followers will believe what they want and vice versa is true as well. While the numbers might not justify the stock value.. who cares when folks are willing to pay for it.

P3GMRRO7KZVQLHAT3XOTZOJN3A.body:
Tesla is quite possibly the MOST overvalued company in the world right now. Toyota doesn't sell solar roofs, nor provide city-wide battery back-up to the local electrical grids like Tesla and Toyota isn't a large electrical utility provider nor does Toyota offer auto insurance to their customers. Tesla seems to be the only company able to sell cars because they're being sold to wealthy people. This is only the beginning of Tesla, can anyone imagine 10 to 20 years from now. Tesla has posted four profitable quarters so far. With Tesla you’re buying their battery technology and their self driving tech. There are at least 5 years ahead of any other company in the World. Tesla is a 
technology company more like Amazon and Apple. They simply sell something nobody else has for another 5 years. Tesla  stock is dirt cheap! When Tesla's shares are over $5000 in 5 years remember I told you.
